 Unit level requirement: level 9. 
 
 Requires 20 clan tokens, 8 other skills to have been selected and membership of a Shogunate specialism clan.

 Requires 10 clan tokens.

Rally Ability. 
 
 When activated, the rally ability will restore nearby routing units to order (shattered units are not affected). 
 
 Units nearby that aren't routing will receive a morale bonus whilst rally is active. 
 
 Unit level requirement: level 9. 
 
 Requires 20 clan tokens, 8 other skills to have been selected and membership of a spear specialism clan.
